Key Match Events: Mayank Yadav bowled with a rattling pace in a promising debut
Varun Chakaravarthy made an impressive comeback to set up India’s dominating seven-wicket win
Arshdeep Singh and Varun Chakravarthy were the pick of the bowlers with three wickets each
Mayank Yadav also performed well and got one wicket
Hardik Pandya and Nitish Kumar Reddy joined hands and made sure to finish the job
Hardik Pandya scored 39 off just 16 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Arshdeep Singh is the PLAYER OF THE MATCH for his brilliant bowling spell
Suryakumar Yadav, the victorious skipper of India, says they just tried to back their skills and tried to walk the talk
Najmul Hossain Shanto, the captain of Bangladesh, says they did not start well and in T20s it is important to play well in the Powerplay but they didn’t
Najmul Hossain Shanto also mentions that the plan was to bat positively but they also need to adjust according to the situation
Najmul Hossain Shanto adds that they need to focus on strike rotation and not only on hitting boundaries
Najmul Hossain Shanto also mentions that they scored 95-odd runs in 14 overs but lost too many wickets
Najmul Hossain Shanto says that it is difficult for the bowlers to defend such a low score on a wicket like this, but still Rishad Hossain bowled well and Fizz delivered a couple of decent overs
Hardik Pandya and Washington Sundar also chipped in with one each as well
It was a real all-round performance from the World T20 champions and the batters also made the chase look like a cakewalk
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh posted a below-par total with only Najmul Hossain Shanto and Mehidy Hasan crossing the 20-run mark
Rishad Hossain did not get a wicket but bowled really well and Shoriful Islam was also economical in his two overs and this is something they can build on in the upcoming games
The target for India was not a big one, but the way they executed the chase was excellent
The positive intent was visible right from the start when the two openers took on the attack
Abhishek Sharma fell to an unfortunate run out but not before playing a fiery cameo
Sanju Samson failed to convert his start again but showed his class in his knock of 29 off 19
SKY was exceptional and displayed a show of brilliant whips and flicks which also ultimately proved to be his downfall
Others: The first T20I in this new stadium in Gwalior and the Men in Blue were simply brilliant with both bat and bowl providing an incredible experience for the packed crowd
The hosts take the early lead in the series with Bangladesh having their task cut out now
Litton Das took a nasty blow on his fingers trying to collect the ball
The physio is in and he will be applying some magic spray to relieve the pain
Bangladesh’s batters did not show up for this game
There were a few positives, mainly the spinners
The target was 127 and India chased it down in 11.5 overs
The match was played on 10th October, 2024
